artist: Painter: After Sir John Opie; Engraver: Ridley; Publisher: John Sewell
description: half length portrait of artist standing facing left and looking out at viewer; wearing jacket, and large frilled cravat; holding palette and brush; illustration to the "European Magazine" 1798
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

below image in black:  Opie pinx\'t   Ridley sculp / John Opie, Esq\'r R.A.  |  on sheet in pencil 2-140
title: Portrait of John Opie
